name: On Thin Ice (Rockhopper Games, Peter_Perkhed, Andy01E, ArthurJ01, Alexander Svensson, Benjamin Jonsson)
name_original: On Thin Ice (Rockhopper Games, Peter_Perkhed, Andy01E, ArthurJ01, Alexander Svensson, Benjamin Jonsson)
description:
On Thin Ice is a narrative co-op party game where you play as Peltola and Prebsen, two penguins taking care of a hotel. But this hotel hides a deeper mystery that YOU have to uncover. During the nights you work in the night shift, where you get a bigger narrative experience in the game. A major focus of the game is to promote cooperation through stress while conveying an interesting and engaging narrative.

Info

This is a two (2) player game, with only local multiplayer. Additionaly this game requires two (2) controllers connected to the PC. Supported controllers are Xbox and Playstation.
